thread.title: Another Amazing Visit
thread.title_full: Another Amazing Visit - Review of Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SVP1111
title: Another Amazing Visit
text: Just wanted to take the time to write another review on my stay at the Shelburne Affinia. This is becoming my favorite place to stay when I come into the city for business thanks to the amazing service of the staff. Especially Renata Zablocka who works at the front desk and goes out of her way to make sure my stay is above and beyond exceptional. It's customer service like this that brings me back and makes me a loyal customer. As someone who has built a career and brand on travel, these special stays are always remembered and very much appreciated. Thank you Renata and Affinia Hotels - Shalini Vadhera Author Passport To Beauty
